name: schooltester
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: school tester
des: School tester is a user friendly reminder tool that can be used to help improve the daily life of students at the University of the West Indies Cave Hill campus. It does this by allowing students to store up coming events with Alexa. It takes the students course, which type of event they want to store, the lecturer's name, the time and date the event will start and it's location. Alexa will store this information and remind the user at midnight of the day event will occur.
